title: Crave Connect
description: REST API with semantic search using pgvector for intelligent food service discovery
longDescription: Built a comprehensive REST API architecture featuring semantic search capabilities powered by pgvector embeddings. The system enables intelligent querying across 20+ data models with advanced PostgreSQL optimization.

title: MUJ Placement Portal
description: Full-stack placement management system with JWT authentication serving 500+ active users
longDescription: Developed a comprehensive placement portal featuring role-based access control, bulk processing capabilities, and real-time updates. Achieved 100% login success rate and reduced manual data entry by 80%.

title: Stock Analysis System
description: Multi-agent NLP system for stock market analysis with 87% query accuracy
longDescription: Engineered a sophisticated multi-agent NLP system integrating 5 data providers (Yahoo Finance, Alpha Vantage, CNBC, MarketWatch, and The Motley Fool) to deliver comprehensive stock analysis with 60% faster query response times.

title: Eye Gaze Tracking
description: Real-time computer vision system for eye gaze estimation with 80%+ accuracy
longDescription: Developed a real-time eye gaze tracking system using MediaPipe and ResNet50, achieving 80%+ accuracy at 30 FPS with 5.3° mean error. Implements advanced computer vision techniques for facial landmark detection and gaze estimation.

title: EcoHive
description: Sustainable credit trading platform - SAP India Hackfest Top 50 from 2000+ entries
longDescription: Created an innovative sustainable credit trading platform that secured Top 50 position at SAP India's National Hackfest from over 2000 nationwide entries. Built with React.js and Tailwind CSS featuring real-time trading and analytics.
